Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Stewart
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wallace, 39th, LaSalle and 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wallace, 39th, LaSalle and 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Stewart.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
